entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as saying 'Yeah, ’ear, ’ear,' with a glance at Fred.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as having the corner of his mouth twitched.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is wearing an odd expression looking at Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being looked at by Lupin with a pitying expression.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as someone Harry's father would have regarded as the height of dishonor to mistrust his friends.

entities.name: peter pettigrew
entities.description: Peter Pettigrew is mentioned as being the one who betrayed James.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as saying he will do the work and come with Lupin.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is mentioned as someone Lupin can ask for help.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as asking where Bill and Lupin are going.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as asking the same question as Tonks.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye's body needs to be recovered by Lupin and Bill.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as asking if they can wait before leaving.

relationships.description: Lupin looked at Harry with a pitying expression.
Lupin can ask Kingsley for help.
Lupin and Bill need to recover Mad-Eye's body.

Fleur also asked where Bill and Lupin were going.
